props.name: text
props.description: Text to use within the error message. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: id
props.description:
ID attribute to add to the error message `

` tag.

props.name: visuallyHiddenText
props.description: A visually hidden prefix used before the error message.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the error message. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
